        Generates a listing of all the reading tips and their tags and comments.
        Returns:
        A list of ReadingTipListingUnits.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws SQL exceptions.

      • saveNewReadingTip

        public void saveNewReadingTip(ReadingTip newTip,
                              Tag allTagsTogether)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Saves a new reading tip.
        Parameters:
        newTip - The new reading tip to be saved.
        allTagsTogether - The tags of the new reading tip.

      • saveNewComment

        public void saveNewComment(Comment newComment,
                           int readingTipId)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Saves a new comment for a reading tip.
        Parameters:
        newComment - The new comment to be saved.
        readingTipId - The ID of the reading tip the comment is for.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws SQL exceptions.

      • toggleReadingTipRead

        public void toggleReadingTipRead(int readingTipId)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Toggles a reading tip as read or unread and sets the lowest priority for it in the new group that it ends up in. (read group or unread group.)
        Parameters:
        readingTipId - The ID of the reading tip.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws SQL exceptions.

      • swapPriorities

        public void swapPriorities(int readingTipId1,
                           int readingTipId2)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Swaps the priorities of two reading tips. The tips must have the same read value.
        Parameters:
        readingTipId1 - The ID of the reading tip 1.
        readingTipId2 - The ID of the reading tip 2.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws SQL exceptions.
